contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox ski area | name = Eaglecrest Ski Area | logo = | picture = The top of the recently opened Black Bear Chairlift.jpg | caption = Top of the recently opened Black Bear Chair | location = [[Douglas Island]],, [[Alaska]]<br>{{USA}} | nearest_city = [[Juneau, Alaska|Juneau]] | lat_degrees = 58 | lat_minutes = 16 | lat_seconds = 34 | lat_direction = N | long_degrees = 134 | long_minutes = 30 | long_seconds = 55 | long_direction = W | vertical = 1400 ft | top_elevation = | base_elevation = | skiable_area = {{convert|640|acre|km2}} | number_trails = 34<br>[[Image:Ski trail rating symbol-green circle.svg|13px]] - 20% easiest<br>[[Image:Ski trail rating symbol-blue square.svg|13px]] - 40% more difficult<br>[[Image:Ski trail rating symbol-black diamond.svg|13px]] - 40% most difficult | longest_run = 2 mi | liftsystem = 4 [[chairlift|chairs]] | lift_capacity = | fast_quadchair = | quad_chair = | triplechair = | doublechair = 4 | terrainparks = | snowfall = 350 in | snowmaking = yes | nightskiing = no | external_link = [http://skijuneau.com/ Eaglecrest Ski Area] |}} '''Eaglecrest Ski Area''' is a public [[ski area]] on [[Douglas Island]] in the [[U.S. state]] of [[Alaska]], across [[Gastineau Channel]] from [[Juneau, Alaska|Juneau]]. The area has 4 [[chairlift|double chairlifts]] accessing {{convert|640|acre|km2}}, with 34 marked alpine runs, 3 Nordic skiing loops and access to world class backcountry. Vertical drop is {{convert|1400|ft|m|abbr=on}} with an average snowfall of 200-300". <ref>[http://www.juneau.org/ecrestftp/MountainStatistics.php]</ref> Although the compound is currently public property, some [[Alaska Legislature|legislator]]s of the region, including [[Randy Wanamaker]], have suggested [[privatization]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.skijuneau.com SkiJuneau.com - official site] {{Coord|58|16|34|N|134|30|55|W|display=title}} [[Category:Buildings and structures in Juneau City and Borough, Alaska]] [[Category:Ski areas and resorts in Alaska]] [[Category:Visitor attractions in Juneau City and Borough, Alaska]] {{Alaska Ski areas navbox}} {{Ski-resort-stub}}
